thread.title: Charlie Wiener's humor and heart come out in 'Protest and Other Love Songs' (CD review)
thread.title_full: Charlie Wiener's humor and heart come out in 'Protest and Other Love Songs' (CD review)

author: Chuck Yarborough, The Plain Dealer
title: Charlie Wiener's humor and heart come out in 'Protest and Other Love Songs' (CD review)
text: Charlie Wiener spends 175 days a year on the road either as a comedian or a singer. The Brunswick-based entertainer rallied a few of his Icons of Perseverance band mates for a new album called "Protest and Other Love Songs,'' recorded live this winter at Peninsula's G.A.R. Hall.
